snippet.title: DEXED Gameplay Video | VR Shooter
snippet.description:
DEXED is a VR shooter for HTC Vive from Ninja Theory (Creators of DmC: Devil May Cry & Heavenly Sword). Created by a team of 8 people in a 3 month game jam, DEXED is requires full two-handed DEXterity to take down enemies. 

Buy DEXED on Steam | http://store.steampowered.com/app/510290/ 

Subscribe | https://www.youtube.com/OfficialNinja...

Follow | https://twitter.com/ninjatheory

Buy Merch | http://store.ninjatheory.com/
